title: Come Again Sweet Love doth Now Invite verses

content.question:
Listen to the excerpt.

After the vocalist sings the words “in sweetest sympathy” for the second time, what term best describes the music of the section that immediately follows with the text “Come Again”?

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
